title: Open source circuit simulator in Python
summary: Simulation of large interconnected electrical circuits particularly with nonlinear controllable devices requires significant computational overhead and also generates a large amount of data. The proposed circuit simulator intends to be able to solve nonlinear systems for large time intervals.
